rules_text:
When Arabelle enters, create your choice of a 1/1 blue Wizard creature token or a Cell token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Tap two untapped tokens you control: Teach Arabelle your choice of flying or vigilance. [i](Put that kind of counter on it. If it already has that ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
